original_title: Power Rangers Lost Galaxy: Return of the Magna Defender
overview: The MAGNA DEFENDER arrives, on Terra-Venture, in search of the "Lights Of Orion": a source of power, that would give it's possessor(s) an advantage, over their enemies... Who'll be victorious - SCORPIOUS, the MAGNA DEFENDER, or the POWER RANGERS of the LOST GALAXY?!!
title: Power Rangers Lost Galaxy: Return of the Magna Defender
